About the Company: Williamson Magor & Company Ltd is the world`s largest producer of tea, having 28 tea estates with an output of 35 million Kgs of tea per year.The group is well established in the bulk tea selling network, both at home and overseas. They have installed state-of-the-art machinery and have centralised research facilities to enhance yield and quality.As consumer tastes become more sophisticated, the group is on course at satisfying this demand and adding value to their products and have successfully launched three brands of packet tea - Tez, Premium Gold and Jaago.
